column1: Gov. Tom Wolf ordered the Pennsylvania Department of Corrections to establish a program officials hope will slow the spread of COVID-19 behind bars, making certain nonviolent offenders eligible for temporary release during the coronavirus pandemic.
Newport Folk And Jazz Festivals Canceled Due To Coronavirus http://tinyurl.com/y9skcs7o
Wearing masks can help reduce the spread of coronavirus, but the practice has led to a new complaint — “maskne,” breakouts caused by wearing a mask for long periods of time.
